overview: Two lovers get to spend a night at a five-star hotel. Today happens to be their 100th day together. But the couple looking forward to a lovely night are met by a series of unimaginable events: a giant hairy fungus, terrifying lightning and thunder, love and cucumber, and Christmas and fart.
tagline: Dedicated to all lovers and all the mold in their rooms.
title: Luxury Staycation
